data.title: NRPyElliptic: Hyperbolic relaxation solver for elliptic equations
data.name: NRPyElliptic
data.description: NRPyElliptic: fast hyperbolic relaxation solver for elliptic equations

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "Thiago Assumpção, Leonardo R. Werneck, Terrence Pierre Jacques, and Zachariah B. Etienne. Fast hyperbolic relaxation elliptic solver for numerical relativity: Conformally flat, binary puncture initial"
"NRPyElliptic is a new, extensible elliptic solver that sets up initial data (ID) for numerical relativity (NR)"
"This repository hosts the following:  `Tutorial-Start_to_Finish-NRPyElliptic.ipynb`: documents the C code generation for the standalone version of `NRPyElliptic`"
